alert.note: Alert for Clay (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued May 07 at 11:52AM EDT until May 08 at 8:00AM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Advisory is extended for the following rivers in Kentucky... South Fork Kentucky River at Oneida affecting Clay County. ...FLOOD ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...South Fork Kentucky River at Oneida. * WHEN...Until Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...At 25.0 feet, Water enters the Campbell building. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:00 AM EDT Saturday the stage was 25.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is near its crest but will continue to run high through today. - Action stage is 21.0 feet. - Flood stage is 29.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Stay tuned to further developments by listening to your local radio, television, or NOAA Weather Radio for further information. The next statement will be issued by 11 PM.
